member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.DacAzureExtensions.DacAzureResources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.DacAzureExtensions.DacAzureResources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.DacAzureExtensions.DacAzureResources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.DacAzureExtensions.DacAzureResources.AkvFailedToObtainToken
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Failed to obtain the access token.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.DacAzureExtensions.DacAzureResources.AkvMissingPermissions
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Missing permissions for Azure Key Vault key '{0}': {1}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.DacAzureExtensions.DacAzureResources.AkvNoAccess
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unable to access Azure Key Vault key '{0}': {1}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.DacAzureExtensions.DacAzureResources.AkvNoCredentials
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Azure Key Vault authentication settings were not configured. 'ClientId' and 'Secret' parameters must be specified as the current operation will result in data motion involving encrypted tables. .

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dac.KeyVault.DacKeyVaultAuthenticator
member.summary: Methods for configuring, verifying, and using Azure Key Vault with DacFx for Always Encrypted

member.name: T:AssemblyRef
member.summary: Sets public key string for friend assemblies.
